Articles.Content: ~2800 users online! The forum is waking up.

> 
> What browser are you using?

Safari on Mac OS X.

> 
> What browser are you using?

It keeps changing, I have tried 6 different browsers and it just depends on WHEN you check it not what browser you are on. It JUST flipped back to images.
My school laptop ran out of energy from all the Hype. Oh well... HYPE!!!
We really need an IRC chat for this...

> 
> To those saying that the mobile page is different, well, I checked it out on my iphone and the page is the same, just unformatted for some reason.

My computer gives me just text, but my phone gives me the image.

Happy landings!

> 
> Wish granted. Release is delayed by 2 months

Don't worry! I already asked Kasper on the IRC Chat to hold the update until this thread gets 300 pages (I really did) HAHAHAHAH

> 
> Wait, guys, I bet the devs are waiting for us to hit 300 to release it....
> FASTER!!!!

LOL! After this comment was posted the Hype Thread jumped 3 pages in 60 seconds. HAHAHA!
I assume this is were one boards the hype train?  *Holds out ticket*

> 
> My computer gives me just text, but my phone gives me the image.
> Happy landings!

I'm not crazy!

Just kidding. Welcome aboard!

Adding to the hype!!!! Excited to begin the ventures of my new O Aerospace Industries company!
You are a demented kerbal smjjames! You will pay for your crimes with MOAR BOOSTERS ON THE HYPE TRAIN!!!!

He's so happy to be in space!
